title: Software Development Project Template
overview: Template for software development projects with comprehensive requirements and milestones
problemStatement: Define the problem this software project aims to solve

requirements.title: Core Functionality
requirements.description: Implement the main features of the application
acceptanceCriteria: User interface is intuitive and responsive

requirements.title: Authentication & Authorization
requirements.description: Secure user authentication and role-based access control
acceptanceCriteria: Users can securely register and login

requirements.title: Data Persistence
requirements.description: Reliable data storage and retrieval system
acceptanceCriteria: Data is stored securely and reliably
Backup and recovery mechanisms are in place

requirements.title: Testing & Quality Assurance
requirements.description: Comprehensive testing strategy and quality metrics

acceptanceCriteria: System passes all tests and quality checks

milestones.name: Planning & Design Complete
milestones.description: Requirements finalized, architecture designed, development plan approved

milestones.name: Feature Complete
milestones.description: All features implemented, ready for testing

milestones.name: Testing & Bug Fixes
milestones.description: Comprehensive testing complete, major bugs resolved

milestones.name: Production Release
milestones.description: System deployed to production, documentation complete

assumptions: Development team has necessary skills and resources
Third-party dependencies are stable and available
Hardware and infrastructure requirements can be met
Stakeholder requirements remain stable during development
constraints: Must comply with relevant security standards
Timeline is fixed due to business requirements
Must be compatible with existing systems

risksAndMitigation.mitigation: Cross-training and documentation to ensure knowledge transfer
Choose stable, well-supported technologies with migration paths
Early performance testing and optimization planning
Regular security audits and adherence to security best practices
